author: ngn
msg: Implemented session termination (VYSPER-222 and VYSPER-223, by Bogdan Pistol)
Normalized handling of allowed origin domains
Improved description of the problems with Easymock in Harmony

author: ab
msg: Fix a silly last-minute error and improve the benchmark.

author: ngn
msg: Fix bug on parsing element names with dashes

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-1004 Add support for the sling.home.prefix system property for the Sling web application. This property may be used to define root location for sling.home folders for Sling web applications deployed without a sling.home init-param

author: phred
msg: Reloads by file, not module name
